a.title: Rising Tide Will Open Third Enrollment Period

h4.a: Rising Tide Will Open Third Enrollment Period

a.title: Rising Tide Will Open Third Enrollment Period

h3.a: Rising Tide Will Open Third Enrollment Period

div.div: Rising Tide has opened an additional Enrollment Period from Friday, April 17, 2020 through Monday, May 18, 2020. The school currently has seats available for grades 9, 10, and 11 and is therefore accepting applications for those grades. Rising Tide currently has long waiting lists in grades 5-8 and does not anticipate exhausting the wait […]

article.class: post-2515 page type-page status-publish hentry entry has-media

a.title: Rising Tide’s Online Scholastic Book Fair Begins Next Week

h4.a: Rising Tide’s Online Scholastic Book Fair Begins Next Week

a.title: Rising Tide’s Online Scholastic Book Fair Begins Next Week

h3.a: Rising Tide’s Online Scholastic Book Fair Begins Next Week

div.div: Rising Tide’s Online Scholastic Book Fair begins next week. You can purchase books from April 8 – 21. Visit our online book fair here for a preview. You can also view an assortment of books here. There are over 6,000 products, including award-winning books, bestsellers, boxed sets, and much more. All orders ship to your […]

article.class: post-2515 page type-page status-publish hentry entry has-media

a.title: Lunches Available for Students During School Closures

h4.a: Lunches Available for Students During School Closures

a.title: Lunches Available for Students During School Closures

h3.a: Lunches Available for Students During School Closures

div.div: Beginning on Monday, March 16, “grab and go” lunch and breakfast will be available, free of charge, for any Rising Tide student. No documentation will be required for students to pick up lunch and breakfast. The meals are being provided, Monday through Friday during the school closure, by the food services of the Plymouth […]

article.class: post-2515 page type-page status-publish hentry entry has-media

a.title: Rising Tide Students Win Congressional App Challenge for Second Year in a Row

h4.a: Rising Tide Students Win Congressional App Challenge for Second Year in a Row

a.title: Rising Tide Students Win Congressional App Challenge for Second Year in a Row

h3.a: Rising Tide Students Win Congressional App Challenge for Second Year in a Row

div.div: Rising Tide Charter Public School is pleased to announce that its Software Development students won the Congressional App Challenge (CAC) for the 9th District of Massachusetts. The winning app was submitted by the team made up of Rising Tide students, Victoria Rice, Leah Maciel, Brynna McNulty, and Joshua Krueger. The students were presented citations by […]

article.class: post-2515 page type-page status-publish hentry entry has-media

a.title: SIGN UP NOW FOR SUMMER ENRICHMENT COURSES!

h4.a: SIGN UP NOW FOR SUMMER ENRICHMENT COURSES!

a.title: SIGN UP NOW FOR SUMMER ENRICHMENT COURSES!

h3.a: SIGN UP NOW FOR SUMMER ENRICHMENT COURSES!

div.div: For the last 16 years, Rising Tide has offered exciting summer enrichment courses during two weeks in July for upper and middle school students. These classes are focused on fun, experience-based learning and are excellent opportunities for students to learn new skills and explore their creativity during the summer days. Classes are open to all […]

article.class: post-2515 page type-page status-publish hentry entry has-media

a.title: Rising Tide to Expand Bus Transportation to 20 Towns

h4.a: Rising Tide to Expand Bus Transportation to 20 Towns

a.title: Rising Tide to Expand Bus Transportation to 20 Towns

h3.a: Rising Tide to Expand Bus Transportation to 20 Towns

div.div: Michael O’Keefe, Head of School at Rising Tide Charter Public School (Rising Tide), announced that the school will offer expanded bus transportation to multiple South Shore towns beginning in the fall of 2020. Students from 20 towns within the school’s designated region will benefit from this new transportation option. These towns include Barnstable, Bourne, Carver, […]
